Title: Create App Config Architecture
Description: Design and implement the base configuration architecture: src/lib/config, interfaces, validation schemas, version tracking (v0.68).

Title: Implement Config Stores
Description: Create projectConfigStore.ts and appConfigStore.ts; persistence abstraction; export/import; migrations.

Title: Create Base Admin UI Components
Description: AdminLayout, AdminCard, EditableField, inheritance indicator, validation UI.

Title: Implement Project Registry v2
Description: Update ProjectRegistry to support identity, theming, prompts, search, data sources, access controls.

Title: Create AI CoE Admin Portal
Description: Global settings, lifecycle control, security & compliance, infra settings, cost controls.

Title: Config Inheritance System
Description: Override tracking, reset-to-default, diff viewer, change history.

Title: Role-Based Access Control
Description: Roles, permission checks, audit logging, role management UI.

Title: Validation & Governance
Description: Field-level validation, approval workflows, compliance checks, audit trails.

Title: Testing & Documentation
Description: Unit tests for stores, integration tests for admin flows, admin docs and guides.
